organic.title: Mom Hid My Game! for Nintendo Switch
organic.snippet: Take back to hunting for consoles hidden by Mom! Let's find the game console Mom hid! Is it inside the chest or on the shelf? Could it be under the sofa, too?

organic.title: Mouse Trap - The Board Game for Nintendo Switch
organic.snippet: It's the chaotic board game you remember! Join your friends and race to collect the most cheese. Are you ready? Welcome to the cheese board of your dreams.

organic.title: Iwata Asks - Game & Watch - Page 1 - Nintendo
organic.snippet: Computers weren't common then. Izushi. Hardware technicians made the games. Iwata. You made a piece of hardware dedicated to a single game.
